title: Nutty Pudding
steps: Add 50-100 mL almond/macadamia milk based upon desired consistency.
Add walnuts, macadamia nuts, ground flax seeds, chia seeds (obtain the highest nutritional value by buying and grinding seeds).
Add cocoa powder, sunflower lecithin, and cinnamon.
Add 3 cherries, 1/2 cup of berries (save half for topping) and pomegranate juice.
Add the rest of the berries.
Optional: Add 30-60 grams of pea protein.
tags: blueprint, bryan johnson, vegan, healthy, plant-based, pudding
